title: Google\Cloud\Compute\V1\SavedDisk
name: SavedDisk
description:
An instance-attached disk resource.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.compute.v1.SavedDisk

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.architecture
params.description: [Output Only] The architecture of the attached disk. Check the Architecture enum for the list of possible values.

params.name: data.kind
params.description: [Output Only] Type of the resource. Always compute#savedDisk for attached disks.

params.name: data.source_disk
params.description: Specifies a URL of the disk attached to the source instance.

params.name: data.storage_bytes
params.description: [Output Only] Size of the individual disk snapshot used by this machine image.

params.name: data.storage_bytes_status
params.description: [Output Only] An indicator whether storageBytes is in a stable state or it is being adjusted as a result of shared storage reallocation. This status can either be UPDATING, meaning the size of the snapshot is being updated, or UP_TO_DATE, meaning the size of the snapshot is up-to-date. Check the StorageBytesStatus enum for the list of possible values.
